projectGridLines.title: Title: Process Statistical Study
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Process Statistical Study

Description: Internal rejection of CCR1 or CCR3 ( reduction by 25%) Skill sets: Chemical /Metallurgy/ Data Analytics/ Chemical Process Control Expected learning: Process Mapping, Data Analytics, Usage of QC tools Specific courses required for project execution: Nil

projectGridLines.title: Title: Life Cycle Study
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Life Cycle Study

Description: Mill Roll Life Study

Skill sets: Mechanical/ Data Analytics

Expected learning: Mill Operations, Data Analytics, Usage of QC tools Specific courses required for project execution: Nil

projectGridLines.title: Title: Development of Application for nomination of LNG to do cost optimization and minimize take out pay.
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Development of Application for nomination of LNG to do cost optimization and minimize take out pay.

Description: Application needs to be developed for nomination of LNG to GAIL, IOCL etc. based on the study of past consumption data of LNG so that plant can achieve cost optimization , penalty reduction and minimize take out pay.

Skill sets: Data Analytics, Application development etc. Expected learning: Data Management , software developing skills etc. Specific courses required for project execution: Basic Knowledge about data management.

projectGridLines.title: Title: Feasibility study of CTU/STU for 400KV line connectivity.
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Feasibility study of CTU/STU for 400KV line connectivity.

Description: Comparative study needs to be done to recognize the feasibility of having either Central Transmission Utility or State Transmission Utility for 400Kv transmission line connectivity

Skill sets: Electrical Engineer with analytical skill set

Expected learning: Learning of 400Kv project, Government policies, Analytical capability building Specific courses required for project execution: Basic knowledge about transmissions and its regulatory policies.

projectGridLines.title: Title: Arc Flash Hazard reduction through Engineering Controls
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Arc Flash Hazard reduction through Engineering Controls

Description: Arc Flash Hazard reduction in HT & LT Switchgear using Engineering Controls

Skill sets: Electrical & Electronics, Power System, Fault Level Analysis, Relay Coordination 

Expected learning: Power System SLD, SC Levels, Arc Flash Risk Calculation & mitigation methods, Fault Level Analysis, Relay Coordination, Electrical Safety  Specific courses required for project execution:

projectGridLines.title: Title: Rectifier Transformer Asset Health Management
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Rectifier Transformer Asset Health Management 

Description: Rectifier Transformer monitoring through signal mapping, model development for Health monitoring, Alarm Mapping 

Skill sets: Field Instrumentation, Transformer, Programming, PLC/DCS

Expected learning: Rectifier Transformer, DCS, Interfacing 

Specific courses required for project execution:

projectGridLines.title: Title:Production Planning & Optimization
projectGridLines.description:
Title:Production Planning & Optimization

Description: Allocation of available resources to maximize production in available time & optimize power consumption.

Skill sets: Manufacturing Engg.

Expected learning: Copper Tube Process, Resource allocation.

Specific courses required for project execution: NA
